description: Integrate AI assistants with Miro boards to manage content seamlessly. Access and manipulate board items through a standardized interface, enhancing collaboration and productivity. Streamline your workflow by leveraging Miro's capabilities directly from your AI tools.

tools.name: list-boards
tools.description: List all available Miro boards

limit.description: Maximum number of boards to return (default: 50)

tools.name: create-board
tools.description: Create a new Miro board with specified name and sharing policies

name.description: Name of the board to create

teamId.description: Team ID to assign the board to

tools.name: update-board
tools.description: Update an existing Miro board with new settings

teamId.description: New team ID to assign the board to

boardId.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the board that you want to update

sharingPolicy.description: New sharing policy for the board

tools.name: delete-board
tools.description: Delete a Miro board by its ID. Deleted boards go to Trash (on paid plans) and can be restored via UI within 90 days after deletion.

boardId.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the board that you want to delete

tools.name: copy-board
tools.description: Create a copy of an existing Miro board with optional new settings

name.description: Name for the new copied board

teamId.description: Team ID to assign the new copied board to

copyFrom.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the board that you want to copy

description.description: Description for the new copied board

sharingPolicy.description: Sharing policy for the new copied board

tools.name: get-specific-board
tools.description: Retrieve information about a specific Miro board by its ID

boardId.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the board that you want to retrieve

tools.name: get-items-on-board
tools.description: Retrieve all items on a specific Miro board

limit.description: Maximum number of items to return (default: 50)

boardId.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the board whose items you want to retrieve

tools.name: get-specific-item
tools.description: Retrieve information about a specific item on a Miro board

itemId.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the item that you want to retrieve

boardId.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the board that contains the item

tools.name: update-item-position
tools.description: Update the position or parent of a specific item on a Miro board

itemId.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the item that you want to update

boardId.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the board that contains the item

parentId.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the new parent item

position.description: New position coordinates for the item

tools.name: delete-item
tools.description: Delete a specific item from a Miro board

itemId.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the item that you want to delete

boardId.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the board that contains the item

tools.name: create-app-card-item
tools.description: Create a new app card item on a Miro board

fields.description: Custom fields to display on the app card

status.description: Status text of the app card

data.description: The content and configuration of the app card

boardId.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the board where the app card will be created

x.description: X coordinate of the app card

y.description: Y coordinate of the app card

position.description: Position of the app card on the board

tools.name: get-app-card-item
tools.description: Retrieve information about a specific app card item on a Miro board

itemId.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the app card that you want to retrieve

boardId.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the board that contains the app card

tools.name: update-app-card-item
tools.description: Update an existing app card item on a Miro board

title.description: Updated title of the app card

fields.description: Updated custom fields to display on the app card

status.description: Updated status text of the app card

description.description: Updated description of the app card

data.description: The updated content and configuration of the app card

itemId.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the app card that you want to update

boardId.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the board that contains the app card

width.description: Updated width of the app card

height.description: Updated height of the app card

geometry.description: Updated dimensions of the app card

x.description: Updated X coordinate of the app card

y.description: Updated Y coordinate of the app card

position.description: Updated position of the app card on the board

tools.name: delete-app-card-item
tools.description: Delete a specific app card item from a Miro board

itemId.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the app card that you want to delete

boardId.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the board that contains the app card

tools.name: create-card-item
tools.description: Create a new card item on a Miro board

dueDate.description: Due date for the card (ISO 8601 format)

data.description: The content and configuration of the card

boardId.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the board where the card will be created

position.description: Position of the card on the board

tools.name: get-card-item
tools.description: Retrieve information about a specific card item on a Miro board

itemId.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the card that you want to retrieve

boardId.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the board that contains the card

tools.name: update-card-item
tools.description: Update an existing card item on a Miro board

dueDate.description: Updated due date for the card (ISO 8601 format)

assigneeId.description: Updated user ID of the assignee

data.description: The updated content and configuration of the card

style.description: Updated style configuration of the card

itemId.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the card that you want to update

boardId.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the board that contains the card

rotation.description: Updated rotation angle of the card

x.description: Updated X coordinate of the card

y.description: Updated Y coordinate of the card

position.description: Updated position of the card on the board

tools.name: delete-card-item
tools.description: Delete a specific card item from a Miro board

itemId.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the card that you want to delete

boardId.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the board that contains the card

tools.name: create-connector
tools.description: Create a new connector between items on a Miro board

strokeStyle.description: Style of the connector stroke (normal, dashed, etc.)

boardId.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the board where the connector will be created

id.description: ID of the item at the end of the connector
ID of the item at the start of the connector

tools.name: get-connectors
tools.description: Retrieve all connectors on a specific Miro board

limit.description: Maximum number of connectors to return (default: 50)

boardId.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the board whose connectors you want to retrieve

tools.name: get-specific-connector
tools.description: Retrieve information about a specific connector on a Miro board

boardId.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the board that contains the connector

connectorId.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the connector that you want to retrieve

tools.name: update-connector
tools.description: Update an existing connector on a Miro board

strokeColor.description: Updated color of the connector stroke

strokeStyle.description: Updated style of the connector stroke (normal, dashed, etc.)

strokeWidth.description: Updated width of the connector stroke

style.description: Updated style configuration of the connector

boardId.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the board that contains the connector

id.description: ID of the item at the end of the connector
ID of the item at the start of the connector

connectorId.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the connector that you want to update

tools.name: delete-connector
tools.description: Delete a specific connector from a Miro board

boardId.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the board that contains the connector

connectorId.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the connector that you want to delete

tools.name: create-sticky-note-item
tools.description: Create a new sticky note item on a Miro board

shape.description: Shape of the sticky note (square, rectangle, circle, triangle, rhombus)

content.description: Text content of the sticky note

data.description: The content and configuration of the sticky note

fillColor.description: Fill color of the sticky note (use predefined values like 'light_yellow', 'light_green', etc.)

textAlign.description: Alignment of the text (left, center, right)

style.description: Style configuration of the sticky note

boardId.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the board where the sticky note will be created

x.description: X coordinate of the sticky note

y.description: Y coordinate of the sticky note

origin.description: Origin of the sticky note (center, top-left, etc.)

position.description: Position of the sticky note on the board

tools.description: Retrieve information about a specific sticky note item on a Miro board

boardId.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the board that contains the sticky note

tools.name: update-sticky-note-item
tools.description: Update an existing sticky note item on a Miro board

shape.description: Updated shape of the sticky note (square, rectangle, circle, triangle, rhombus)

content.description: Updated text content of the sticky note

data.description: Updated content and configuration of the sticky note

fillColor.description: Updated fill color of the sticky note (use predefined values)

textAlign.description: Updated alignment of the text (left, center, right)

textColor.description: Updated color of the text on the sticky note

style.description: Updated style configuration of the sticky note

itemId.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the sticky note that you want to update

boardId.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the board that contains the sticky note

width.description: Updated width of the sticky note

height.description: Updated height of the sticky note

geometry.description: Updated dimensions of the sticky note

x.description: Updated X coordinate of the sticky note

y.description: Updated Y coordinate of the sticky note

origin.description: Origin of the sticky note (center, top-left, etc.)

position.description: Updated position of the sticky note on the board

tools.description: Delete a specific sticky note item from a Miro board

itemId.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the sticky note that you want to delete

boardId.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the board that contains the sticky note

tools.name: create-frame
tools.description: Create a new frame on a Miro board

type.description: Type of the frame. Only 'freeform' is supported currently.

title.description: Title of the frame. This title appears at the top of the frame.

format.description: Format of the frame. Only 'custom' is supported currently.

showContent.description: Hide or reveal the content inside a frame (Enterprise plan only).

data.description: The content and configuration of the frame

fillColor.description: Fill color for the frame. Hex values like #f5f6f8, #d5f692, etc.

boardId.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the board where the frame will be created

position.description: Position of the frame on the board

tools.name: get-frame-item
tools.description: Retrieve information for a specific frame on a Miro board

itemId.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the frame that you want to retrieve

boardId.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the board that contains the frame that you want to retrieve

tools.name: update-frame-item
tools.description: Update a frame on a Miro board based on the data, style, or geometry properties provided in the request body

type.description: Type of the frame. Only 'freeform' is supported currently.

title.description: Title of the frame. This title appears at the top of the frame.

format.description: Format of the frame. Only 'custom' is supported currently.

showContent.description: Hide or reveal the content inside a frame (Enterprise plan only).

data.description: The updated content and configuration of the frame

fillColor.description: Fill color for the frame. Hex values like #f5f6f8, #d5f692, etc.

style.description: Updated style configuration of the frame

itemId.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the frame that you want to update

boardId.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the board where you want to update the frame

position.description: Updated position of the frame on the board

tools.name: delete-frame-item
tools.description: Delete a frame from a Miro board

itemId.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the frame that you want to delete

boardId.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the board from which you want to delete the frame

tools.name: get-organization-member
tools.description: Retrieves information about a specific organization member (Enterprise only)

tools.name: add-project-member
tools.description: Adds a member to a project (Enterprise only)

role.description: Role to assign to the user

email.description: Email ID of the user to add to the project

orgId.description: The ID of the organization to which the project belongs

teamId.description: The ID of the team to which the project belongs

projectId.description: The ID of the project to which you want to add a user

tools.name: get-project-member
tools.description: Retrieves information about a specific project member (Enterprise only)

orgId.description: The ID of the organization to which the project belongs

teamId.description: The ID of the team to which the project belongs

memberId.description: The ID of the member for which you want to retrieve information

projectId.description: The ID of the project from which you want to retrieve specific member information

tools.name: remove-project-member
tools.description: Removes a member from a project (Enterprise only)

orgId.description: The ID of the organization to which the project belongs

teamId.description: The ID of the team to which the project belongs

memberId.description: The ID of the member that you want to remove from a project

projectId.description: The ID of the project from which you want to remove a member

tools.name: get-all-cases
tools.description: Retrieves the list of eDiscovery cases in an organization (Enterprise only)

limit.description: The maximum number of items in the result list

orgId.description: The ID of the organization for which you want to retrieve the list of cases

tools.name: get-case
tools.description: Retrieves information about a specific eDiscovery case (Enterprise only)

orgId.description: The ID of the organization for which you want to retrieve the case information

caseId.description: The ID of the case you want to retrieve

tools.name: get-all-legal-holds
tools.description: Retrieves the list of all legal holds within a case (Enterprise only)

limit.description: The maximum number of items in the result list

orgId.description: The ID of the organization for which you want to retrieve the list of legal holds

caseId.description: The ID of the case for which you want to retrieve the list of legal holds

tools.name: get-legal-hold
tools.description: Retrieves information about a specific legal hold (Enterprise only)

orgId.description: The ID of the organization for which you want to retrieve the legal hold information

caseId.description: The ID of the case for which you want to retrieve the legal hold information

legalHoldId.description: The ID of the legal hold you want to retrieve

tools.name: get-legal-hold-content-items
tools.description: Retrieves the list of content items under legal hold (Enterprise only)

limit.description: The maximum number of items in the result list

orgId.description: The ID of the organization for which you want to retrieve the list of content items under hold

caseId.description: The ID of the case for which you want to retrieve the list of content items under hold

legalHoldId.description: The ID of the legal hold for which you want to retrieve the list of content items under hold

tools.name: get-board-content-logs
tools.description: Retrieves content change logs of board items (Enterprise only)

limit.description: Maximum number of results to return

emails.description: List of user emails to filter by

boardIds.description: List of board IDs to filter by
